sentence.Network_en: The hills are covered with verdure.
sentence.Network_cn: 山上覆盖着葱茏的草木.

sentence.Network_en: The rugged surface of the Palatine was muffled with tender verdure.
sentence.Network_cn: 这座昔日王宫的那片凹凸不平的场地上覆盖着一层嫩绿.

sentence.Network_en: On every side were wooded mountain tops, green with tropical verdure.
sentence.Network_cn: 四面八方都是树木成林的山峰, 呈现出热带的青葱草木.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via French from Old French verd 'green', from Latin viridis
